Name: MaryPark St.
About the game: MaryPark St. is a short story telling indie game, set in a black and white dream-like world. Following the main character, trying to get to his friend who seems to always be busy, as each day feels more and more repetitive. Additionally now as a free update it includes the second interpretation of the story, called 'The Nightmare'. BECAUSE LOVE NEVER DIES Features Easy to play: Generic controls: arrow keys for movement, and Z key to interact. Intriguing Storyline: This game adheres to themes of isolation and self-reflection. MaryPark St. was designed to appeal to mass demographic whilst having itâ€™s short but unique story. Unique Atmosphere: The world of MaryPark St. is entirely black and white. With smooth lineart and only essential details, the setting is ominous and bleak. Original Soundtrack Playtime: Between 10 - 15 minutes.
